class.name: moveit_hybrid_planning/SinglePlanExecution
class.description: Simple hybrid planning logic that runs the global planner once and execute the global solution with the local planner.

class.name: moveit_hybrid_planning/ReplanInvalidatedTrajectory
class.description: Simple hybrid planning logic that runs the global planner once and starts executing the global solution with the local planner. In case the local planner detects a collision the global planner is rerun to update the invalidated global trajectory.

class.name: moveit_hybrid_planning/MoveItPlanningPipeline
class.description: Use default MoveIt planning pipeline as Global Planner

class.name: moveit_hybrid_planning/SimpleSampler
class.description: Simple trajectory operator plugin that updates the local planner's reference trajectory by simple replacing it and extracts the next trajectory point based on the current robot state and an index.

class.name: moveit_hybrid_planning/ForwardTrajectory
class.description: Simple local solver plugin that forwards the next waypoint of the sampled local trajectory.

class.name: moveit_hybrid_planning/ServoSolver
class.description: Uses Servo as a local solver.
